East-17

Glad all worked well for you.
But please note that patches,cracks,keygens,tools etc are normally flagged by A/V as trojans.
These are called "false positives".
ANY/ALL executables i include in my uploads have been thoroughly tested on multiple rigs before upload.

Good that you raised the issue as others can read and hopefully learn from the comments.

This is definitely 32-bit only.  I have 64-bit Windows 8 Pro installed.  After I installed MS Office (from this torrent), and I then downloaded a 64-bit language pack here:

http://www.mydigitallife.info/office-2010-language-packs-free-official-direct-download-links/

But when I tried to install the 64-bit language pack, it produces an error saying that the Office edition I have installed is only 32-bit!

So if what you claim is true, then there must be some way to switch Office from 32 to 64.  Please advise.

To supplement my previous comment...
I downloaded 2010kaiser's other torrent, the one that is x64 only, and found it to truly be x64.  So I recommend that one rather than this one, if you want 64-bit MS Office Pro Plus:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7727056/MS_Office_2010_Pro_Plus_(SP1_Integrated)_x64bit-2010kaiser
Actually, teh default installer is 32-bit. If you mount teh image then go and check teh folder you'll see there is a 64-bit folder as well. Use that one to install 64-bit :)
